creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: outline drawing of young woman seated on ground with an abundance of robes billowing around her; holding PR hand to face, looking wistfully toward a painting of two figures at L; inscription on either side of woman
inscription: center: [In our country\'s history of the wise and the learned, / how worthy they are . . . ]
signed: R edge: [Painted by Kurōdodokoroshū Shōrokuinoge Shikibushō Tairokushin Sugawara Ason Tametaka]
title: Court Lady with paintings of Japanese Sages
